mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, count(*) as count from tb_order GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert ignore into tb_order(eid, wid, pid, amount, status) values (#{eid}, #{wid}, #{pid}, #{amount}, #{status})
mapper.update: update tb_order set status=#{status} where id=#{id}
